WorkItem.Description:
For example, MinifyWith="" does not list Uglify as a valid option.

What would also really help is real documentation, and not scattered blog posts. Examples are nice and appreciated, but it's hard to know what is still valid, as well as what the possibilities are. A slightly more formal write-up would be great, especially for the console app.
WorkItem.Summary: chirp.config schema is out of date or not accurate

Comments.Message: Thanks. Any idea when that file will become the version at http://www.weirdlover.com/chirpy/chirp.xsd?
